mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
